subject: Paranormal Micro Box 8-in-one Device video
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
For anyone interested in seeing a video which explains my Paranormal 
Micro Box 8-in-one Device (Mike's Micro Box), I've posted a 2 part 
video on YouTube.
What it has... Proximity detector, ION detector, Temperature Sensor, 
Motion detector, USB camera, White Noice Generator, LED flashlight, 
warning strobe. 

Watch Part 1 here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Z4If6m4zRY
Watch Part 2 here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bz97GsiXdog

- Mike
